Game.Name: Earth Bound (USA) (Proto)
Game.plot: Mother is a Role-Playing game, developed by Pax Softonica and published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 1989.Cheat: Avoid enemies easilyBy opening the Menu often out in the field, you will encounter enemies much less often. This is a bug in the game that was removed in future releases such as Mother 1+2.Cheat: Unlimited Magic HerbsWhile in Magiciant in the northern area you can find a red weed sitting in the middle of a bunch of green weeds. "Check" the red weed and you will recieve the Red Weed. Now bring the Red Weed to the Fountaain in the North West of Magiciant and "Use" the Red Weed. The Red Weed will change into a Magic Herb.
